thread.title: Kenneth Noye wins bid to be moved to open prison | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Kenneth Noye wins bid to be moved to open prison | Daily Mail Online

author: Martin Robinson
title: Kenneth Noye wins bid to be moved to open prison | Daily Mail Online
text: BREAKING NEWS: Road-rage killer Kenneth Noye wins High Court challenge in his bid to be moved to an open prison Murderers Noye was sentenced to life with a minimum term of 16 years in 2000 Stabbed to death Stephen Cameron, 21, on M25 in Kent in 1996 and fled to Spain 2015 parole board recommended release to open jail - Michael Gove blocked it Noye's QC says killer's risk to public had significantly reduced' since the killing In 1985 Noye stabbed DC John Fordham 10 times but jury agreed it self-defence
